import React from 'react'; import SEO from '../components/SEO'; import CTABanner from '../components/CTABanner'; const About = () => { const values = [ { icon: ( ), title: 'No BS, Just Results', description: 'We don\'t hide behind jargon or vanity metrics. You\'ll always know exactly what we\'re doing and why — in plain English.', }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Local First', description: 'We live and work in BANES. We understand the local market, the competition, and what it takes to win here.', }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Fair Pricing', description: 'No hidden fees, no surprise charges. We quote fairly and deliver on our promises. Your success is our success.', }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Partnership Approach', description: 'We\'re not just a service provider — we\'re invested in your growth. When you win, we win.', }, ]; const stats = [ { value: '150+', label: 'Local Businesses Helped' }, { value: '5+', label: 'Years Experience' }, { value: '£2.4M', label: 'Revenue Generated for Clients' }, { value: '4.9★', label: 'Average Google Rating' }, ]; const reasons = [ { title: 'We Specialise in Local', description: 'Big agencies chase big contracts. We focus exclusively on local businesses in BANES — it\'s all we do, and we do it better than anyone.', }, { title: 'We Speak Your Language', description: 'No confusing tech talk. We explain everything in plain English so you always know what\'s happening with your marketing.', }, { title: 'We\'re Accountable', description: 'Monthly reports, regular check-ins, and real metrics that matter. You\'ll always know exactly what you\'re getting for your investment.', }, { title: 'We Get Results', description: 'Our clients see an average 340% increase in leads within 6 months. We don\'t just promise results — we deliver them.', }, ]; return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background */}
About SEO Kings

Helping Local Businesses Win Online

We're a Bath-based digital marketing agency dedicated to helping tradespeople and small businesses in BANES get found on Google and grow their customer base.

{/* Stats Bar */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Our Story */}
Our Story

Born From Frustration With the Industry

We started SEO Kings after seeing too many local businesses get burned by marketing agencies. Tradespeople paying hundreds a month for "SEO services" with nothing to show for it. Confusing reports full of jargon. Agencies that disappeared after cashing the cheque.

We knew there had to be a better way. So we built an agency that does things differently — one focused exclusively on local businesses right here in Bath and North East Somerset.

Today, we've helped over 150 local businesses dominate their local search results. From plumbers and electricians to restaurants and salons, we've seen what works (and what doesn't) in this market.

Our mission is simple: help local businesses get found by local customers.

{/* Visual Element */}
{/* Main Image */}
{/* Timeline Overlay */}
2020 — Founded in Bath
2022 — 50 clients milestone
2024 — 100+ businesses ranked #1
Today — 150+ businesses served
{/* Our Values */}
Our Values

What We Stand For

These aren't just words on a wall — they're how we run our business every single day.

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Why Choose Us */}
{/* Content */}
Why Choose Us

We're Not Like Other Agencies

{reasons.map((reason, index) => (
{index + 1}

{reason.title}

{reason.description}

))}
{/* Testimonial Card */}
{/* Quote Icon */}
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
"I've worked with 3 different marketing agencies before finding SEO Kings. The difference is night and day. They actually explain what they're doing, they deliver on their promises, and my phone hasn't stopped ringing since we started working together."
DM
Dave Mitchell
Mitchell Plumbing, Bath
{/* Local Focus */}
Local Focus

Proudly Serving Bath & North East Somerset

We're not a faceless agency in London. We're based right here in Bath, and we only work with businesses in our local area.

{[ 'Bath', 'Keynsham', 'Midsomer Norton', 'Radstock', 'Peasedown St John', 'Paulton', 'Saltford', 'Timsbury', 'Westfield', 'Chew Magna', 'Temple Cloud', 'Clutton', ].map((area, index) => (
{area}
))}

Don't see your area? Get in touch — we probably cover it.

{/* Meet the Team */}
Our Team

Small Team, Big Results

We're a tight-knit team who genuinely care about helping local businesses succeed. When you work with us, you'll have direct access to the people actually doing the work.

{/* Team Grid */}
{[ { name: 'James Wilson', role: 'Founder & SEO Lead', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=300&h=300&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { name: 'Emma Roberts', role: 'Web Developer', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?w=300&h=300&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { name: 'Tom Baker', role: 'Content Strategist', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=300&h=300&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { name: 'Sophie Chen', role: 'GBP Specialist', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=300&h=300&fit=crop&crop=face' }, ].map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

))}
Direct communication
No account managers
Quick response times
); }; export default About;
